member.name: T:PNTSimNative.PNT
member.summary:
The PNT class provides a CLS compliant, Object (native) interface to the MATLAB functions contained in the files:
D:\Projects\PNTRC\PNTSim.m

member.name: M:PNTSimNative.PNT.#cctor
member.summary: The static constructor instantiates and initializes the MATLAB Compiler Runtime instance.

member.summary: Constructs a new instance of the PNT class.

member.summary: Class destructor called by the CLR garbage collector.

member.summary: Frees the native resources associated with this object

member.name: M:PNTSimNative.PNT.PNTSim
member.summary: Provides a single output, 0-input Objectinterface to the PNTSim MATLAB function.
member.remarks: M-Documentation: PNTSim:Performance Simulation Platform of PNT augmentation with LEO Constellation Argumentation Input: figid: figure type constid: constellation type typeid: figure subtype para1: additional param depending on typeid para2: additional param depending on typeid Output fp : full file path of result file Author: Lei Wang Email: Lei.Wang@whu.edu.cn 2017/10/31
member.returns: An Object containing the first output argument.

member.name: M:PNTSimNative.PNT.PNTSim(System.Int32,System.Object[]@,System.Object[],System.Object[])
member.summary: Provides an interface for the PNTSim function in which the input and output arguments are specified as an array of Objects.
member.remarks: This method will allocate and return by reference the output argument array. M-Documentation: PNTSim:Performance Simulation Platform of PNT augmentation with LEO Constellation Argumentation Input: figid: figure type constid: constellation type typeid: figure subtype para1: additional param depending on typeid para2: additional param depending on typeid Output fp : full file path of result file Author: Lei Wang Email: Lei.Wang@whu.edu.cn 2017/10/31
member.param: The number of output arguments to return
Array of Object representing variable input arguments

member.name: M:PNTSimNative.PNT.WaitForFiguresToDie
member.summary: This method will cause a MATLAB figure window to behave as a modal dialog box. The method will not return until all the figure windows associated with this component have been closed.
member.remarks: An application should only call this method when required to keep the MATLAB figure window from disappearing. Other techniques, such as calling Console.ReadLine() from the application should be considered where possible.
